notesStmt.note: Imperfect; lacks all before leaf A2 and all after leaf E3. STC 22681, with which STC identifies this item, is a variant of STC 22680. Variation is imprint date: 1590 (STC 22680); 1591 (STC 22681). Since copy filmed is missing title page, imprint date is unknown, and identification as STC 22681 is speculative.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
